item.title: Boxed in by shifting tariff rules, European shippers pause some U.S.-bound parcels
item.description: New customs regulations take effect August 29, and many European postal agencies and companies say until new systems are set up they can't ship some g...

item.title: Evacuations ordered as wildfire blazes California's famed Napa County
item.description: Firefighters are working to contain a blaze currently tearing through California's beloved wine country.

item.title: Trump administration halts work on an almost-finished wind farm
item.description: The Revolution Wind farm was slated to start sending power to homes and businesses in Rhode Island and Connecticut starting next year.

item.title: US seeks to deport Kilmar Abrego Garcia to Uganda
item.description: Immigration officials said they intend to deport Kilmar Abrego Garcia to Uganda after he declined an offer to be deported to Costa Rica, according to ...

item.title: Hawaii's Kilauea volcano erupts again and shoots lava for 31st time since December
item.description: Hawaii's Kilauea volcano resumed erupting Friday by shooting an arc of lava 100 feet into the air and across a section of its summit crater floor.
